item.description:
Lets enjoy a day together out in the fresh spring air at Mclaughlins Vineyard we will listen to
The Crickstones formed in 2002, as the backing band for Irish native Liz McNicholl. For the past six years, their sound has been evolving into a crisp blend of Americana, bluegrass, and country, combining Liz's unmistakable Irish flair with the rock, swing, reggae, Celtic and Grateful Dead-loving backgrounds of, John Hurley, MorganEve Swain Fred McKay, Eric Howell and Peter Blossom. and enjoy wine tasting. We are all welcome to bring our Own Picnic lunch and a desert to share with the group. Can it get any better then this, Wine, Music and desert!

All concerts are $15 in advance/$18 at the door.

Includes logo glass & wine tasting or glass of wine.

Children 18 years and under are 1/2 price.

Picnics welcome.

"Bon Appetit"
Denise

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: A SPRING SUNDAY PICNIC AT MCLAUGHLINS VINEYARD
